description: Details of refuse and recycling, in pursuant to condition 5 of planning application Ref: 222390FUL dated 02/10/2024 (as amended by 244227NMA, dated 13/12/2024 and 250602NMA, dated 05/03/2025) for: Construction of a second floor and habitable loft space to accommodate 3no. self-contained residential units.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted information pursuant to condition 5 of planning permission
222390FUL dated 02/10/2024 (as amended by 244227NMA, dated 13/12/2024 and 250602NMA, dated 05/03/2025) is deemed to be unsatisfactory and does

not meet the requirements of the conditon. The space proposed for the temporary waste cupboards was approved for bin and bike storage under 244227NMA dated 13/12/2024. The removal of the bike storage from the plans requires a new planning permission and cannot be assessed under this condition discharge.
The proposal would therefore fails to comply with the approved plans set out under condition 2 and is not in the interests of proper planning.
